about_the_game:
Fateful Bullet is an exhilarating third-person arena shooter set in a futuristic world with a vibrant anime aesthetic. Engage in adrenaline-pumping combat where agility and strategy are key to dominating your opponents. Experience the thrill of performing Matrix-style moves, such as wall jumps and dashes, to outmaneuver your enemies and gain the upper hand.

Key Features:


Dynamic Movement System: Execute impressive wall jumps and dashes to navigate the battlefield with style and precision.

Character Customization: Create and personalize your own unique character with a wide array of customization options.

Three Distinct Play Styles:
  • Unlimited: Combine firearms and melee weapons for versatile combat.
  • Only Swords: Engage in intense melee combat using only swords.
  • Only Guns: Rely solely on your firearms for ranged battles.

Variety Of Game Modes:
  • Team Deathmatch: Work with your team to outscore the opposition.
  • Touchdown: Capture and deliver the objective to score points.
  • Battle Royale: Survive against all odds in a free-for-all showdown.
  • Arcade: Enjoy various fun and challenging scenarios.

Ranked and Casual Play: Climb the ranks in competitive matches or enjoy casual sessions with friends in private lobbies.

Weapon and Skill Variety: Equip up to three weapons along with skills and items to enhance your combat effectiveness.


Join the battle in Fateful Bullet and rise through the ranks as you showcase your skills and strategic prowess. Whether competing for glory or just having fun with friends, Fateful Bullet offers an engaging and action-packed experience for all players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 8800 GT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 and above
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 or ATI Radeon HD 7950
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Fateful Bullet is a fast-paced, third-person arena shooter set in a futuristic world with anime-inspired characters. Dive into intense team-based PvP combat where your skills and strategy will determine the outcome!

English*, French
